name: Control Panic (Energyz)
description:
You play as goom, who is desesperate to find this exit out of this ghost world. They're number is growing out of control, and you are both fighting for the precious keys. Defeat them to earn precious controls that will help you in your daunting task, but don't let them touch you! 

Use the mouse to aim and fire, WASD or ZQSD for the movement. Abilities to unlock are H or space to double-jump, J or E to dash forward and K to exit the your exit portal.

You need java to play this game
